Title: Plague Drones
Legend: Plague Drones are high-ranking Plaguebearers who travel atop Rot Flies. These daemonic mounts attack with their toxic stingers and foul mouthparts, while their riders hurl death’s heads projectiles that explode in showers of filth.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in a Droning Guard army

Intro: Each model in a Plague Drones unit is armed with a Plaguesword and Death’s Heads.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Tallyband of Nurgle

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Rot Flies are each armed with Claws, Mouthparts and a Sting.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Plaguebringer. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Plaguesword.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 3 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. If the unmodified battleshock roll for a unit that includes any Icon Bearers is 1, you can return 1 slain model to that unit and no models in that unit flee in that battleshock phase.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 3 models in this unit can be a Bell Toller. Re-roll battleshock rolls of 1 for enemy units that are within 6" of any friendly Bell Tollers.

Rules.Name: Putrid Explosions
Rules.Fluff: An exploding death's head covers all those in the vicinity with disease-riddled filth.
Rules.Rule: The Attacks characteristic of a Death’s Head is equal to the number of models in the target unit, to a maximum of 7.
